name: Serial No Data
query:
SELECT
    -- From Site Item (Child)
    si.mobile_no AS "Mobile No:Data:130",
    si.serial_no_sim_no AS "Serial No / SIM No:Link/Serial No:180",
    si.data_plan AS "Data Plan:Data:130",

    -- From Serial No
    sn.status AS "Serial Status:Data:100",
    sn.brand AS "Brand:Data:120",

    -- From Site (Parent)
    s.name AS "Circuit ID:Link/Site:150",
    s.solution_name AS "Solution Name:Data:150",
    s.solution_code AS "Solution Code:Data:120",
    s.site_name AS "Site Name:Data:180",
    s.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:180",
    s.order_type AS "Order Type:Data:120",
    s.site_type AS "Site Type:Data:120",
    s.site_status AS "Site Status:Data:120"

FROM
    `tabSite Item` si
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSerial No` sn ON si.serial_no_sim_no = sn.serial_no
    AND sn.item_group = 'Telecom'
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSite` s ON si.parent = s.name

WHERE
    sn.serial_no IS NOT NULL

ORDER BY
    si.mobile_no ASC
LIMIT 1000000;
